TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit TitleStyle extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle
Public NotInheritable Class TitleStyle Inherits TableItemStyle

summary.span: 指定区域中 Web 部件控件的标题栏的样式特性。

span.span: Specifies the style characteristics for the title bars of Web Parts controls within a zone.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类与区域一起用于指定适用于区域中 Web 部件控件标题栏的通用样式特征。The class is used with zones to specify common style characteristics that apply to the title bars of Web Parts controls within the zones. 属性包含对 每个区域的对象的引用。The property contains a reference to a object for each zone. 控件的标题栏在运行时呈现为 HTML 表单元格。A title bar for a control is rendered at run time as an HTML table cell. 由于 类从 类继承，因此它允许您为标题栏设置类似于任何表格单元的属性的样式属性。Because the class inherits from the class, it allows you to set stylistic attributes for a title bar similar to the attributes for any table cell. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示类的声明性用法 。The following code example demonstrates the declarative use of the class. 在以下页面的代码中， `` 元素和 `` 元素显示在区域内，使相应的控件在运行时具有正版 Web 部件功能。In the code for the following page, an `` element and an `` element appear within a zone, giving the corresponding controls genuine Web Parts functionality at run time. 请注意， `` 包含多个样式属性的元素将应用到该区域中包含的两个 Web 部件控件的标题栏。Notice that the `` element, which contains several style attributes, applies to the title bars of both Web Parts controls contained within the zone. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_PartTitleStyle_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_PartTitleStyle_Overview/CS/parttitlestylecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_PartTitleStyle_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_PartTitleStyle_Overview/VB/parttitlestylevb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数创建并初始化类的新实例 。Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the class. 构造函数将属性的值设置 为 `false` 。The constructor sets the value of the property to `false`.

MemberSignature.Value: public override bool Wrap { get; set; }
Public Overrides Property Wrap As Boolean
public: virtual property bool Wrap { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.Wrap : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示部件控件标题的内容是否在标题栏中换行。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the contents of the title bar for a part control wrap in the title bar.

value.span: 如果标题栏的内容在标题栏中换行，则为 ；否则，为 。

span.span: if the contents of a title bar wrap in the title bar; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类将重写基 属性，以便它可以将值设置为 `false` 。The class overrides the base property so that it can set the value to `false`. 将 属性设置 为 `false` ，以便在默认情况下，部件控件的标题栏不允许其内容换行。The sets the property to `false`, so that by default, a title bar for a part control does not allow its contents to wrap. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了属性的声明性用法 。The following code example demonstrates the declarative use of the property. 在以下页面的代码中， `` 元素和 `` 元素显示在区域中，这将在运行时为相应的控件提供正版 Web 部件功能。In the code for the following page, an `` element and an `` element appear within a zone, which gives the corresponding controls genuine Web Parts functionality at run time. 请注意， `` 包含多个样式属性的元素将应用到该区域中包含的两个 Web 部件控件的标题栏。Notice that the `` element, which contains several style attributes, applies to the title bars of both Web Parts controls contained within the zone. 另请注意， `` 元素具有 `wrap` 和 `width` 属性。Notice also that the `` element has `wrap` and `width` attributes. 由于 属性值设置为 `true` ，并且两个控件的标题栏中的文本比分配给该属性的值宽 `width` ，因此，每个控件的标题栏文本会在页面加载到浏览器中时换行。Because the property value is set to `true`, and the text in the title bars of the two controls is wider than the value assigned to the `width` attribute, the title bar text of each control wraps when the page is loaded in a browser. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_PartTitleStyle_Wrap#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_PartTitleStyle_Wrap/CS/parttitlestylewrapcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_PartTitleStyle_Wrap#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_PartTitleStyle_Wrap/VB/parttitlestylewrapvb.aspx#1)]
